item.title: Check This Out WTF?
item.dc:creator: @p00n_scape p00n scape
item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

i’ll Show you what Code i Used that it gives me The Errors

[code]public static Random random = new Random();
public boolean tradeAccepted;

private String news[] = // actual news messages
{
	"@red@Register on the forums: @dre@IbarragePk.Go-board.com!",
	"@red@Donate to help keep IBarragePk! Online/alive",
	"@red@Don't ask for staff! To prevent from getting Banned/Jailed Read ::rules",
	"@red@(Do Not Ask) Mini Slurpee/Keylogged For free Items.",
	"@red@",
	"@red@Vote everyday atleast once a day At VoteNao.Tk for more players/Votes."
};

private int newsIndex = random.nextInt(news.length); // random index from 0(inclusive) to length of news array(exclusive)
private Timer newsTimer = new Timer(150);

// sends the news message to player
public void news()
{
	sM("[NEWS] - "+news[newsIndex]);
	newsIndex++;
	if (newsIndex >= news.length) // index out of bounds, reset to beginning
		newsIndex = 0;
}
// end news[/code]
